meanings.definition: The quality of being bold or confident
meanings.sent1: Her forwardness in asking questions impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: His forwardness in speaking up during the meeting showed confidence.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's forwardness in approaching the big dog was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The forwardness of the young entrepreneur in pitching her idea was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The forwardness of the child in trying new things was refreshing.

meanings.definition: The state of being ready or eager to do something
meanings.sent1: The team's forwardness to start the project was commendable.
meanings.sent2: Her forwardness to help others made her a valuable team member.
meanings.sent3: The forwardness of the students to learn about space was amusing.
meanings.sent4: His forwardness to explore new opportunities led to success.
meanings.sent5: The forwardness of the volunteers to assist after the storm was heartwarming.

meanings.definition: The act of moving or facing in a direction ahead or to the front
meanings.sent1: The forwardness of the ship towards the horizon was exciting.
meanings.sent2: The car's forwardness on the road made the journey smooth.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's forwardness in waddling on the ice was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The forwardness of the hiker up the mountain was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The forwardness of the river flowing towards the sea was unstoppable.
